column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////lous lives up to the hype. i was a bit skeptical because it seemed like one of the tourist traps. however
column2: i love the crust of the deep dish here. its buttery
column4: but doughy all at once. the traditional deep dish is a must get. its over welming
column5: so i suggest sharing it. their service was okay
column6: takes a little while to get your pizza and other things. however
column7: the tiramisu was good too! it almost looked too perfect but i really liked it.
